body:
~This is PR #12860, but downloading tarballs instead of checking out from gitlab.~

~- Except for the latest release (4.3.4), downloads are not available anymore from
tddft.org. Replace by gitlab.~

- remove patch
- update URL / https for tddft.org
- replace `setup_environment` by `setup_build_environment`
title: libxc: download from gitlab
